title: Kruemelkueche
description: Krümelküche is vegan cafe operating since Aug 2014 in the Hausprojekt Hochfeld, a place for people to create something they like, to live together, and to join different projects. Serves vegan burgers, sandwiches, cakes. Everything is house-made, and most ingredients are organic. There's also a little shop selling vegan products in the entrance room as well as a space for local artists to sell their products. Hosts concerts some weekends.
